title: 'Tay Or Nay' With Michael And Mary In The Morning!
description:
There's nothing more fun than getting with your friends and gossiping about all things Taylor Swift! That's exactly what happened on this episode when Ana, Lacey, Nick and Amy got to talk to a very talented podcast, Michael and Mary in the Morning! They made a big move during covid and have constantly kept us entertained! Find out all about their major life moves, their Swift wishes and projections, and their advice for others! Plus, play along while we do a game called Tay or Nay!
Find Michael and Mary on all platforms @michaelandmaryinthemornings, @lifebymichael, @marykantner.
What theory did we miss? Who should we have on next?

CONTACT THE PODCAST!

This podcast is in no way related to or endorsed by Taylor Swift, her companies, or record labels. All opinions are our own.
